title: Bug 138175: Bookmark link set in drill through link should be saved in Hyperlink Options dialog.
OB: The selected bookmark is not displayed in the Hyperlink Options dialog after reopening it, but the bookmark is still saved in the xml source.
EB: The Hyperlink Options dialog should display the target bookmark that was set in the drill through link.
SR:
1. Open the Hyperlink Options dialog.
2. Set a bookmark in the drill through link.
3. Close the Hyperlink Options dialog.
4. Reopen the Hyperlink Options dialog.
5. Verify that the target bookmark is displayed in the dialog.
